about

I'm co-founder of Helios Analytics, a startup using LLMs for equity research. I'm also an MS student at the University of Georgia studying Artificial Intelligence.


In the past, I've:

  • Made trading tools at D. E. Shaw
  • Influenced AI policy at the Department of Health and Human Services
  • Conducted polling on AI policy at Data For Progress

I'm interested in:

  • Artificial intelligence, consciousness, neuroscience
  • American politics, local government, civic technology
  • Economic geography, progress studies, development

I'm originally from Chandler, Arizona. Contact me at suhan.kacholia03@gmail.com.
